definition: to be pleased with; specifically, to satisfy adebt
kjvTranslation: (be) accept(-able), accomplish, set affection, approve, consent with, delight (self), enjoy, (be, have a) favour(-able), like, observe, pardon, (be, have, take) please(-ure), reconcile self.

translations.bg: да бъде удовлетворен; по-специално, да удовлетвори дълг
translations.da: at være tilfreds med; specifikt at indfri en gæld
translations.de: zufrieden sein; insbesondere eine Schuld befriedigen
translations.el: να είμαι ευχαριστημένος- συγκεκριμένα, να ικανοποιώ ένα χρέος
translations.es: complacer; en concreto, satisfacer una deuda
translations.fr: être satisfait ; en particulier, satisfaire une dette
translations.hu: elégedettnek lenni; konkrétan, kielégíteni az adósságot
translations.id: untuk membuat senang; khususnya, untuk memuaskan adebt
translations.it: essere soddisfatti; in particolare, soddisfare un debito
translations.ja: を満足させる；具体的には、負債を満足させる
translations.lv: būt apmierinātam; īpaši, lai apmierinātu parādu
translations.nb: å være fornøyd med; spesielt å tilfredsstille en gjeld
translations.nl: om blij mee te zijn; specifiek, om een schuld te voldoen
translations.pl: być zadowolonym; w szczególności, zaspokoić dług
translations.pt: estar satisfeito com; especificamente, satisfazer uma dívida
translations.ro: a fi mulțumit de; în special, a satisface o datorie
translations.ru: быть довольным; в частности, удовлетворять долг
translations.sl: biti zadovoljen; še posebej, poravnati dolg
translations.sv: att vara nöjd med; särskilt att tillfredsställa adebt
translations.tr: memnun olmak; özellikle, bir borcu yerine getirmek
translations.zh: 满意；具体地说，满足债务
